room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: Our family did The Cabin today and almost escaped! Loved the facility, clean and neat, and the decor was great. The best part is how nice the owners are! Their daughter was our host and showed us the ropes and I can't say enough nice things about her! We had such a fun time as a family - we will definitely be back to try out the other 2 rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: We had a blast in the cabin room. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: Did “The Cabin” and loved it! We mixed the kids and adults and it was awesome! We will be returning! Thanks for the awesome adventure!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: We took a group of nine today and choose the Cabin, we had the best time. The owners were great, and made it a wonderful time! Everyone should go check it out!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: It was a blast! My husband and I went for our date night and were teamed up with another group of four. We all bonded and had such a great time! Did The Cabin and it was fun and challenging! Thank you for creating such a fun space!
